description:
Suffering a personal injury often leads to more than just physical harm. At The Law Offices of Pardy & Rodriguez, P.A., in Bradenton, Florida, we assess the many ways in which incidents such as a car accident, workplace incident or other event has affected you. Our team accounts for everything from a loss of wages to future medical bills. As a result of our detail-oriented approach, we have recovered significant verdicts and settlements for thousands of people.

The attorneys at our law offices have decades of combined experience navigating the full spectrum of negligence issues. Working with us means receiving the benefits of:

  • A team of legal professionals who truly care about your future
  • A track record of success in the courtroom and in negotiations
  • Attorneys who remain in close contact with you throughout the process

Our team has earned a number of honors, such as a membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and a listing in the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' 10 Best.

The Law Offices of Pardy & Rodriguez, P.A., accepts credit cards. We also start each case with a free initial consultation. With a number of offices across the state, we are conveniently located for many of our clients. However, we also have the ability to meet with clients virtually, such as over the phone or via videoconferencing. Our team can also provide services in both Spanish and English.
